It's none of my business but, Frank will need to call ebay the  number can =

be found in the security section, and he will have to let them know  they =

are committing fraud, otherwise nothing will be done.  I saw these ads  on=
 
ebay too, but I thought, Frank may have been trying to earn some money fo=
r  all 
his hard work, nothing wrong with that either, that was before I jo=
ined  
these groups. sf
